properties.areaDesc: Wayne, IL; White, IL; Gallatin, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:53AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Illinois...

Little Wabash River at Carmi

.River levels along the Little Wabash River are rising due to heavy
rainfall of 1 to 2 inches that has fallen over the past 24 hours
combined with additional heavy rain forecast over the next 36 hours.
Moderate flooding is forecast to develop at Carmi. River levels are
forecast to go above flood stage Saturday morning and crest near
34.5 feet later next week.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Little Wabash River at Carmi.
* from Saturday morning until further notice.
* At  9:30 AM Friday the stage was 21.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 27.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow late morning and
continue to rise to near 34.5 feet on Thursday.
* Impact...At 35.5 Feet...Businesses just downstream of IL Route 14
and Route 1 in Carmi flood.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
